house_listing.house_description: PANORAMIC VIEWS from the balcony and master suite overlooking 10 beautiful acres and in-ground pool. This custom home sports a European style gourmet kitchen with gas cooktop, tile counter tops, large serving bar and double oven. Impressive Great Room has tiled fireplace and floors, 10 ft. ceilings and French doors. The energy-efficient home features zoned air, has heat and 2 gas hot water heaters. Master bath has "top of the line" Kohler fixtures including jacuzzi tub, separate shower and bidet. This great family home is priced to sell at $269,000.
